name: Life is Money (Durbo)
description:
Life is Money is a top down shooter where health becomes the single most important resource. Fight through 21 waves featuring 6 different enemies. Hit and kill enemies to gain back health or wait for your regeneration to kick in. Upgrades costs health at the shop, and shooting in general costs health so be careful not to run out!

This game was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Gamejam. You should check out the other submissions over there!

Note: v1.0.0 has some minor bugs but is still available for download since it was the version originally submitted during the submission period for the GMTK game jam.

Controls:

WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot.
